page.title: 18Careers in Rising Brook. (2)
page.content: The jobs available in the area tend to be in garages or shops such as the Coop or Stars Newsagents. 25% of the 5th formers wish to remain at school. 25% of these wish to stay on for one year. The remainder will take higher qualifications such as Advanced levels. Rising Brook has a good reputation for supplying the labour market with employees who have good logical views. Each year 7-10% enter for University or Polytechnic places. The boys at the school are more likely to gain employment than the girls and this has been the case for many years. The majority of boys go in for Technical Apprenticships in the army or some craft employment.
